subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Warning,
author: Tim Woolworth
full_text:
Good advice.  Back up drives are cheap, but the content they hold can be
irreplaceable.

On Sun, May 1, 2011 at 10:44 AM, <SnowfireL@...> wrote:

>
>
>  Everyone please be careful with file storage, I had lost most all of mine
> because my back up drive failed, I can't get them back, i lost the MFR, and
> I don't know what to do now, lost all, my family and horse pictures, music
> collection, all the spirit files, all my saved Theme collection, a program I
> can never get back, so, please everyone, make at least two different back up
> drives. sf
>
>  
>
